Talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_01>Ha! There we go! <sp:5:0:0>Now let's try something
a little trickier...
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Determination_00>Aim for those dummies over there...
Maybe we can hit them all with a <clr:0000>single
lightning strike<clr:ffff>?
Here's an idea... Don't try to hit a
specific dummy.

Instead, aim for the area in the middle of
all three, <sp:5:1:0>like <clr:0000>right around where that
rock<clr:ffff> is jutting out.
Oh!<sp:5:0:0> But keep in mind that the <clr:0000>farther
away<clr:ffff> a target is from me, the <clr:0000>longer<clr:ffff> it will
take me to build up the energy to hit it.
